General.Name: Trench Metals Corp
General.Description: Trench Metals Corp. operates as a mineral exploration and development company in Canada. It has an option agreement to acquire a 100% interest in the Higginson Lake Uranium project covering an area of approximately 5,900 hectares located in Athabasca, Saskatchewan. The company was formerly known as Trench Solutions Inc. and changed its name to Trench Metals Corp. in November 2020. Trench Metals Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 28046 Del Rio Road, Temecula, CA, United States, 92590
